titleStmt.title: Instructions for a young nobleman, or, The idea of a person of honour done out of French.
Pour un jeune seigneur. English
titleStmt.author: La Chétardie, Trotti de, chevalier, d. 1703.
Spence, Ferrand.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Pour un jeune seigneur.
Written by Trotti de La Chétardie and translated by Ferrand Spence. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
First ed. in English. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
